name: Growlithe
flavorText:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

previous.name: Primeape
previous.flavorText:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

next.name: Arcanine
next.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.
